title: In what ways did the Twilight movies ruin the books? - Quora

response.answer_text: My sister and wife who have both read Twilight agree that the books are bad enough, they are poorly written with bad plotting, 1-dimensional characters and terrible dialogue. But the movies are even worse with terrible acting - Kristen Stewat has one facial expression and been out acted by CGI trees, and crappy directing. Even Rifftrax had trouble making the movies watchable and they made Batman & Robin funny

they completely missed out the points of why edward and bella were in love and turned it into some type of horror, unappealing series of movies. there are a lot of parts in the books where bella and edward had found the true purpose of life which isnt shown anywhere through the movies.
